resources.string:
Important notes

All the dB in this software are Decibels relative to full scale (dBFS). There is no simple way to convert dBFS to acoustics dB (e.g. dB SPL or dBA).
A full-scale sine wave is designated 0 dBFS.
The dBA in this software is a simple minded A-weighting dBFS.
The calculation of spectrum (and spectrogram) is done through FFT with chosen window function and with a 50% data overlap.
This software have a high power consumption.

Button operation

spum/spam
spum: Show the spectrum at each time point.
spam: Show the spectrogram in a duration. The color represent strength of the sound at certain frequency and certain time.

Note: spam mode cost more power than spum mode, and counld exhaust all you computing power(CPU/GPU) at high sampling rate (you will receive a "Recorder buffer overrun" warning).

dB/dBA
Switch between dBFS and A-weighting dBFS. dBA is widely used in environmental noise measurement. But here dBA is only for reference (simple minded A-weighting dBFS, instead of acoustics dBA).

cursor/scale
In cursor mode, touching the plot area moves the cursor
In scale mode, moving or "pinching" scales and zooms the x axis. Double click the plot area to switch to cursor mode.

run/stop
stop freezes the display(paused), making it easier to inspect the waveform. The recorder is still working when paused.
run resumes analyzing samples.

by S A Uhler and xyy
